message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_CONCERN_ROLE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A client has not been entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be before the Case start date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_FV_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_XFV_START_DATE_CASE_END_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role start date must not be later than the Case end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CONCERNCASEROLE_XFV_END_DATE_CASE_END_DATE
message.locale: The Client Role end date must not be later than the Case end date - "%1d".
